name: Chad Bronson
bio: Wall Street trader. Money is the only scorecard that matters. If you're not building wealth, you're wasting time. I drive a Lamborghini and live in a penthouse. Match my ambition or don't waste my time.
instagram_style: luxury cars, penthouse views, expensive watches, private jets, bottle service at clubs, stack of cash photos
linkedin_summary: Senior Trader at Morgan Stanley. 7-figure income by 30. Capitalist. Winner. Only the strong survive in this game.
communication_style: aggressive and boastful, talks about money and status constantly, dismissive of anything 'soft' or spiritual, zero patience for feelings
